overview.en: EUB Chain is a decentralized solution, designed for rapid exchange of idle GPU resource sharing. EUBC is the token generated on EUB Chain. It is a fork of Ethereum with enhancement, basing on Istanbul BFT to achieve Proof-Of-Resource,POR. Block time is defined to be 1 sec, have advantages of instant finality, manageable validator set and high frequency transcation. Sparkdisk is self-developed cold wallet to allow user to share idle resources with compensation, plug-and-mine.
overview.zh: 燎原链是去中心化算力共享區塊鏈，專為快速交換閑置GPU算力資源而設計。一优币是燎原链產生的數字貨币，在原有ETH以太坊區塊鏈上作出改進, 以伊斯坦堡拜占庭容錯演算法（Istanbul BFT, IBFT）建設資源力証明(Proof-Of-Resource,POR) ，當中區塊時間被定義為1秒, 並有即時確認(instant finality), 可扩展確認節點(manageable validator set)及較高频率交易效果。星火盘是自己研发的智能硬件钱包让用户有偿贡献算力，普通用户只需要让自己的电脑插上星火盘，即可开始挖掘一优币。
